performance_metrics.name: Yield Rate (%)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of dough that successfully transforms into baked bread. Accounts for waste due to spoilage, over-proofing, or under-proofing.

performance_metrics.name: Throughput (Bags/Hour)
performance_metrics.description: Number of 2.5kg bread bags produced per hour. This varies greatly based on bread type and automated level.

performance_metrics.name: Crumb Volume (cm³/g)
performance_metrics.description: Average crumb volume in cubic centimeters per gram of bread. A key indicator of bread texture and quality.

performance_metrics.name: Moisture Content (%)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of water content in the final bread product. Impacts shelf life and overall texture.

performance_metrics.name: Cell Count (Cells/g)
performance_metrics.description: Number of gas cells per gram of bread. High cell count generally correlates with a lighter texture.

performance_metrics.name: Shelf Life (Days)
performance_metrics.description: Average shelf life of the finished bread product under controlled conditions.

implementation_requirements.name: Dough Mixer
implementation_requirements.specifications: Spiral Mixer: 150-300 HP; Capacity: 500-1000 kg per batch; Mixing Time: 3-7 minutes
implementation_requirements.description: Industrial-scale mixer for homogenous dough preparation.  Stainless steel construction required.

implementation_requirements.name: Proofing Cabinet
implementation_requirements.specifications: Temperature: 27-32°C; Humidity: 70-80%; Capacity: 800-1200 kg; Controlled Environment
implementation_requirements.description: Temperature and humidity-controlled environment for dough fermentation.

implementation_requirements.name: Shaping Machine
implementation_requirements.specifications: Throughput: 100-200 bags/minute; Material: Stainless Steel; Accuracy: +/- 2mm
implementation_requirements.description: Automated machine for shaping dough into desired loaf shapes.

implementation_requirements.name: Deck Oven
implementation_requirements.specifications: Temperature: 230-260°C; Baking Time: 30-45 minutes; Capacity: 200-400 loaves per batch
implementation_requirements.description: Industrial oven for baking bread. Precise temperature control is crucial.

implementation_requirements.name: Cooling Conveyor
implementation_requirements.description: Conveyor system for cooling baked bread efficiently.

implementation_requirements.name: Packaging System
implementation_requirements.specifications: Film: Modified Atmosphere Packaging (MAP) – Nitrogen Flush; Bag Size: 2.5kg; Sealing Force: 10-15 kN
implementation_requirements.description: Automated system for packaging bread in sealed bags under controlled atmosphere.

Sanitation Protocols: Strict adherence to hygiene standards to prevent contamination.
Waste Management: Implementing strategies to minimize dough waste and packaging material usage.
Staff Training: Proper training for all personnel involved in the breadmaking process.
Process Optimization: Regular analysis of production data to identify areas for improvement.
